## Single-Agent Test

### CartPole-v0 (OpenAI Gym)
We train single agent in the environment with different RL algorithms.

 **DQN**:

![gym_CartPole-v1_False_DQN](img/single_agent/gym_CartPole-v1_False_DQN_20210722105534reward.png)

DQN is less stable, probably needs early-stopping.

**PPO**:

![gym_CartPole-v1_False_PPO](img/single_agent/gym_CartPole-v1_False_PPO_20210722104135reward.png)

PPO is more stable.

### SlimeVolley-v0 (Slime Volleyball)

**DQN**:

![slimevolley_SlimeVolley-v0_False_DQN](img/single_agent/slimevolley_SlimeVolley-v0_False_DQN_20210722111248reward.png)

![slimevolley_SlimeVolley-v0_False_DQN](img/single_agent/slimevolley_SlimeVolley-v0_False_DQN_20210722111248length.png)

**PPO**:

![slimevolley_SlimeVolley-v0_False_PPO](img/single_agent/slimevolley_SlimeVolley-v0_False_PPO_20210722120311reward.png)

![slimevolley_SlimeVolley-v0_False_PPO](img/single_agent/slimevolley_SlimeVolley-v0_False_PPO_20210722120311length.png)
